name: Herocles' Drunken Dad
description:
Take on the role of Herocles, the brainy, magical brother of Heracles!
Your father, Zeus, is in a drunken rage! Calm him down the only way that seems to work with him....Zap him with his own lightning! Avoid Zeus' thunderbolts and collect thunder shards to build up your charge of electricity. Be careful, get hit and you'll lose your charge, or get hit while uncharged and it's Game Over!

< and > keys: move left and right
^ key while charged: shoot lightning up

You can store up to 3 shards of lightning. The more stored
lightning you have when you shoot, the more damage it does to Zeus. Get him to zero to make him sober up!
